projects.title: Vaccination Tracker
projects.description: A Vue.js application designed to track vaccination records and schedules.
features: User-friendly interface for tracking vaccinations
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Data visualization for vaccination statistics

projects.title: Let's Travel
projects.description: A static travel website showcasing various destinations and travel packages.
features: Attractive layout with images and descriptions
Responsive design for various devices
Interactive elements for user engagement

projects.title: Nous Chat
projects.description: A real-time chat application built using Vue.js and Firebase.
features: Real-time messaging with Firebase
User authentication and chat rooms
Responsive and clean UI

projects.title: Weather by City and Location
projects.description: A weather application that provides current weather information based on city or user's location.
features: Fetches weather data using OpenWeatherMap API
Allows search by city or geolocation
Displays temperature, humidity, and weather conditions

projects.title: Movie App with Vue.js
projects.description: A movie browsing application built with Vue.js, allowing users to search and view movie details.
features: Search functionality for movies
Displays movie details and posters
Responsive design for various devices

workingOn.title: Bayān – Arabic Prompt Booster
workingOn.description: A Next.js app that helps Arabic speakers get richer ChatGPT answers by translating and optimizing their questions into powerful English prompts, then returning high-quality Arabic responses.
features: Arabic-to-English prompt optimization with contextual enhancement
Delivers answers in fluent Arabic using OpenAI’s GPT
Clean, responsive UI with loading and error handling
Ideal for non-English speakers seeking high-quality AI results

workingOn.title: ChartMind – Ask & Visualize
workingOn.description: A Nuxt 3 web app that turns natural language questions into beautiful, AI-generated charts using GPT and Chart.js.
features: Transforms user questions into chart-ready data using GPT
Returns structured JSON to render charts automatically
Supports pie, bar, line, donut, and radar charts
Responsive, modern UI built with Tailwind CSS and Nuxt 3
